cab.content: I iDooun^nt io the Pr^e':***/ -rlid22ftMilitary Secret.1286 xswv ^rom Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India, ' 3rd February 1920.' (Received 9th.) 1472. Reference to our telegram 189, dated 7th. January, and 568, dated.15th January. Malleson reports, that Bolshevik airplanes are flying daily in Askabad area.Please telegraph how matter of provision of airplanes and armoured cars for his Forcenow stands.
